channel.title: Free Guest Passes!
channel.description:
[b]EDIT: Both Guest Passes Redeemed. Please do not PM me, they are gone.[/b]
I have a guest pass to CSS and to DoDS.
First person with [b]over 200 posts[/b] to PM me which one they want will get it. Obviously, if you want a CSS guest pass but its already taken, tough luck, shouldve asked for the DoDS pass. One pass per person, you can't ask for both lol.
All I ask is for a "thanks" in return to be posted here if you get one. Maybe some +rep. :slight_smile:
Why over 200 posts? Because theyve stuck around here, truly dedicated. Or they spamalot, in which case they should suck it.
NOTE: This isnt spam or anything, im serious, i have no use for a guest pass. I'll update this post once one/both of my passes are gone.
[b]Day of Defeat Source pass went to Coolm4n.[/b] [b]Counter Strike Source pass went to Garthbartin.[/b]

item.title: Free Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Sadly many of the boxes were empty.
And I didnt want to get caught, so i only took photos of two games: portal, and oblivion. But the oblivion key didnt register (I’m assuming it wasn’t a steam CD key).

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Free Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
I wouldve given away portal. I got it… ermm, this person i know got it real easy.

  1. He went into the mall, and walked into a videogame store
  2. There were some PC games on display, with obviously no discs inside.
  3. He opened up the portal box, and inside was the manual
  4. On the manual was an unused CD key, which would never be used considering the case was on display
  5. He took a photo of the CD key and activated it on his account.

So, next time this person gets portal like that, i’ll let u know.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Guest Passes!

item.description:
Anyone have EP2 and/or Portal to give away? I’d take that.

<_<

_>

What?

Read full topic

item.title: Free Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Sorry, but I think its obvious that it really cuts down on the amount of people that are gonna PM me. It just makes things easier. I never said the users will less than 200 are bad members, thats retarded.

Obviously, if they have 200+ posts they contribute, because I doubt the admins on these forums will tolerate over 200 posts of spam. I assume that they are good members, unlike the impression some of u guys are giving me. of course, it is a dick move to give away free CSS and DoDS guest passes. Right?

Doesn’t matter. The CSS account is taken by garthbartin once he posts a reply to this thread.
EDIT: Passes are gone.

Read full topic
